WBBM >< PRESS INFORMATION
WRIGLEY BUILDING. CHICAGO
August 26, 1954
"FINLAND.NATION ON A TIGHTROPE"
FOURTH OF "THE SEVENTH CONTINENT" SERIES
Finland, a nation that lies in the tundra area between the east
and the west, will be the subject on the new WBBM documentary series,
"The Seventh Continent", Thursday, September 2. This program will
feature three guests; Mr. Heikki Kirkinen and Mr. Niilo Suhonen,
Finnish Youth Counsellors attending the World Council of Churches, in
Evanston, and Mr. Ensio Vakkinen, former member of the Finnish Mer¬
chant Marine, who came to the United States during World War II.
"The Seventh Continent" will show a country in a delicate
position.....on a figurative tightrope, trying to get along with the
West, where its sympathies lie, and trying to get along with the East
(U.S.S.R.), a power which at any moment, could walk right through
Finland and crush it.
"The Seventh Continent" is dedicated to bringing to light
significant facts which often escape the attention of the average
citizen.
This new WBBM documentary series is heard on alternate Thurs¬
days from 7:30 to 8:00 PM on Station WBBM. The fifth program of the
series will be heard on September 16.
Producer-Director is A1 Bland and the writers are Budd Blume
and Virginia Renaud.
